#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,ht1,mt1,st1,ht2,mt2,st2,hrt,mrt,srt,rt;
    bool flag;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>ht1>>mt1>>st1;
        cin>>ht2>>mt2>>st2;
        hrt=ht2-ht1;
        mrt=mt2-mt1;
        srt=st2-st1;
        flag=0;
        if(srt<0)
        {
            srt=60-(st1-st2);
            if(mrt<=0)
            {
                mrt=60-(mt1-mt2);
                if(hrt<=0)
                {
                    hrt=24-(ht1-ht2);
                }
                hrt--;
            }
            mrt--;
        }
        mrt=hrt*60+mrt;
        srt=srt+mrt*60;
        srt=srt/100;
        if(srt%2)
            cout<<"C"<<endl;
        else
            cout<<"S"<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
